tankor, obsidian and silvernbolt shoot their plasma cannons at disel
 CatMaster o <catmastero@...> wrote:OOC: Waspinator was the one who attacked them.

IC: 
Waspinator took the impact of the energy and was knocked through the
air causing him to crash behind some rocks.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> : : Savage/Wrath/Crush : :
> 
> Wrath and Crush both leap at Savage, knocking him down, but
preventing harm to him.  Inferno's stinger explodes on impact as it
hits the ground.  The velocity knocks KroniK(Wrath and Crush) off
their feet, leaving Savage to fend for himself for a moment.
> 
> Savage:  Chew on this!
> 
> Savage yields a rifle-like weapon, and fires a blast of dark energon
at Inferno.  Meanwhile, Wrath and Crush slowly get to their feet,
dazed but unharmed.
> 
>
